attributes.action: Introduce an independant panel who set and monitor targets for individual M.P's and Government Department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time we saw value for money for our elected MP's and their Departments, so ALL MP's from the Most Junior to Prime Minister should be set targets by an independent panel and be closely monitored on their results.
anyone who does not meet his or her targets to be dismissed from government and a replacement found.
